title: Internet-Based Behavioral Skills Training to Strengthen Mental Health Coping Capabilities for Nursing Home Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mental health concepts and experience in nursing home operations
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning using digital devices and project-based collaboration to analyze real-world cases and develop solution strategies

learning_goals: Learners can explain symptoms and coping strategies for mental illnesses by type with 90% accuracy.
Learners can develop effective intervention plans for simulated mental health crisis scenarios in PBL tasks.
Learners demonstrate a 20% improvement in self-efficacy and a 15% increase in behavioral intention in a 4-week follow-up assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
